data.chText: 优势；益处；成效
data.enText: an advantage that sth gives you; a helpful and useful effect that sth has

data.chText: 我得益于受过良好教育。
data.enText: I've had the benefit of a good education.

data.chText: 新规章将使所有有关人员受益。
data.enText: The new regulations will be of benefit to everyone concerned.

data.chText: 早到将会对你有利。
data.enText: It will be to your benefit to arrive early.

data.chText: 他看不出再争论下去有什么好处。
data.enText: He couldn't see the benefit of arguing any longer.

data.chText: 现代医学的裨益
data.enText: the benefits of modern medicine

data.chText: 看到她终于收获辛勤劳动的成果令人欣慰。
data.enText: It was good to see her finally reaping the benefits (= enjoying the results) of all her hard work.

data.chText: 福利费（政府对失业者、病人等提供的补助金）
data.enText: money provided by the government to people who need financial help because they are unemployed, ill/sick, etc.

data.chText: （公司提供的）褔利，奖金；（保险公司支付的）给付，保险金
data.enText: an advantage that you get from a company in addition to the money that you earn; money from an insurance company

data.chText: 投保人一旦死亡，该项保险将给其家属支付相当可观的保险金。
data.enText: The insurance plan will provide substantial cash benefits to your family in case of your death.

data.chText: 慈善（或公益）活动
data.enText: an event such as a performance, a dinner, etc., organized in order to raise money for a particular person or charity

data.chText: 义赛；慈善音乐会
data.enText: a benefit match/concert
for sb's benefit

data.chText: 为帮助某人；为某人的利益
data.enText: especially in order to help or be useful to sb

data.chText: 我帮上星期缺席的人打印了些上课的要点。
data.enText: I have typed out some lecture notes for the benefit of those people who were absent last week.

data.chText: 别为我费工夫！
data.enText: Don't go to any trouble for my benefit!
give sb the benefit of the doubt

data.chText: （在证据不足的情况下）假定某人说实话，假定某人没有错
data.enText: to accept that sb has told the truth or has not done sth wrong because you cannot prove that they have not
or
-tt-

data.chText: 对（某人）有用；使受益
data.enText: to be useful to sb or improve their life in some way

data.chText: 我们应该把这笔钱花在大家都能得益的事上。
data.enText: We should spend the money on something that will benefit everyone.

data.chText: 得益于；得利于
data.enText: to be in a better position because of sth

data.chText: 到底是谁会从这些变革中直接获益？
data.enText: Who exactly stands to benefit from these changes?

means: 福利费(政府对失业者、病人等提供的补助金)
(保险公司支付的)给付，保险金

ex.enText: They gained an advantage over their enemy.

ex.chText: 这家酒店很小，但有个优点就是离汽车站近。
ex.enText: The hotel is small, but it does have the advantage of being close to the bus station.

synonyms.bx: 指有助于获得成功的因素或某事有利的方面。

ex.enText: He stopped smoking for his own benefit.

ex.chText: 清晨早起对这位病人的健康非常有益。
ex.enText: Getting up early in the morning is of great benefit to this patient's health.

synonyms.bx: 最常用词，指任何利益或好处。

ex.chText: 整天看电视没什么好处。
ex.enText: There's no profit in watching TV all day long.

ex.chText: 学生做这些练习也许会有裨益。
ex.enText: Students could do these exercises with profit.

data.enText: for sb's benefit

data.chText: 为帮助某人；为某人的利益
data.enText: especially in order to help or be useful to sb

data.chText: 我帮上星期缺席的人打印了些上课的要点。
data.enText: I have typed out some lecture notes for the benefit of those people who were absent last week.

data.chText: 别为我费工夫！
data.enText: Don't go to any trouble for my benefit!
give sb the benefit of the doubt

data.chText: （在证据不足的情况下）假定某人说实话，假定某人没有错
data.enText: to accept that sb has told the truth or has not done sth wrong because you cannot prove that they have not

tr: something that aids or promotes well-being
a performance to raise money for a charitable cause
financial assistance in time of need

example: She profited from his vast experience

value.def: The benefit of something is the help that you get from it or the advantage that results from it.

example.ex: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor...
example.tran: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

example.ex: I'm  a great believer in the benefits of this form of therapy...
example.tran: 我坚信这种治疗形式非常有益。

example.ex: For maximum benefit, use your treatment every day.
example.tran: 为了达到最佳效果，你每天都要接受治疗。

value.def: If something is to your benefit or is of benefit to you, it helps you or improves your life.

example.ex: This could now work to Albania's  benefit...
example.tran: 这种情况目前对阿尔巴尼亚有利。

example.ex: I hope what I have written will be of benefit to someone else who may feel the same way.
example.tran: 我希望我所写的内容能对其他和我有同感的人有所裨益。

value.def: If you benefit from something or if it benefits you, it helps you or improves your life.

example.ex: Both sides have benefited from the talks.
...a variety of government programs benefiting children.
example.tran: 有益于儿童的各种政府项目

value.def: If you have the benefit of some information, knowledge, or equipment, you are able to use it so that you can achieve something.

example.ex: Steve didn't have the benefit of a formal college education...
example.tran: 史蒂夫没能接受正规的大学教育。

example.ex: With the benefit of hindsight, it is clear we ought to have done more...
example.tran: 事后看来，我们显然本该做得更多。

example.ex: This remarkable achievement took place without the benefit of our modern telecommunication industry.
example.tran: 这项非凡成就的取得并没有借助于现代电信业这个有利条件。

value.def: Benefit is money that is given by the government to people who are poor, ill, or unemployed.

example.ex: I was told that in order to get benefit payments I would have to answer some questions.
example.tran: 我得知要领补助，就得回答一些问题。

example.ex: The very poorest parents are not in work, they are living on benefit.
example.tran: 正是这些极端贫困的父母没有工作，靠救济金过活。

value.tran: （政府提供给穷人、病人和失业人员的）救济金，补助金

value.def: A benefit, or a benefit concert or dinner, is an event that is held in order to raise money for a particular charity or person.

example.ex: I am organising a benefit gig in Bristol to raise these funds.
example.tran: 我要在布里斯托尔组织一场义演来募集这些资金。

value.def: If you give someone the benefit of the doubt, you treat them as if they are telling the truth or as if they have behaved properly, even though you are not sure that this is the case.

example.ex: At first I gave him the benefit of the doubt...
Shalford is entitled to the benefit of the doubt.
example.tran: 沙尔福德暂且获得了信任。

value.def: If you say that someone is doing something for the benefit of a particular person, you mean that they are doing it for that person.

example.ex: You need people working for the benefit of the community...
example.tran: 你们需要为社区谋利益的人。

example.ex: He doesn't have to go through this elaborate display for my benefit!
example.tran: 他不必为了我作这么详细的展示！

trans: 经济利益； 经济效益
社会效益；社会收益；社会利益；社會效益；社交利益
有资格得到救济金（指生病、失业等津贴）
假定其无过失或无罪（因无充分证据证明某人有罪；裁判员对可疑情况无把握时不对有关运动员作不利判定
福利范围，福利待遇，一揽子福利，福利套餐
失业补贴(或津贴)；失业救济金
税收利益；纳税利益；税收收益；税务优惠；税收优惠
